data.title: 1. Fill Out the Evaluation Form
data.info: Tell us a little about yourself as well as your preferred lesson day, time, and location.

data.title: 2. Lesson Confirmation
data.info: After filling out the evaluation, we'll get in contact with you through phone or email to confirm your lesson.

data.title: 3. We Come To You
data.info: We'll meet you any where in the Austin, Texas area. If you don't have a boat check out our rental affiliates page for popular rental locations.

data.title: Former Texas A&M Wake Team Member
data.info: Chandler was an active member and officer of the Texas A&M Wake team for 4 years.

data.title: Collegiate National Champion
data.info: Intermediate Division Champion at the 2016 Collegiate National Championships.

data.title: Former Freedom Wake Park Instructor
data.info: Awarded 2018 Wake School of the year by the WSIA.
